members.name: Saura Naderi
members.bio: Saura Naderi is the K–14 Outreach Director at UC San Diego’s School of Computing, Information, and Data Science, where she creates hands-on robotics and data science experiences that connect undergraduates, researchers, and K–12 students. Her work blends engineering, creativity, and education to make STEM more accessible and inspiring.
